content: chunky ribbed stripes hat by kaitlyn duncan yarn chunky weight needles us 10 16 circular and double pointed instructions cast on 72 stitches place marker and prepare to knit in the round knit hat body row 1-22 join in the round and knit 1x1 ribbing starting with a knit stitch 22 row row 23-26 knit around 4 row row 27-30 1x1 ribbing starting with a purl stitch 4 row row 31-34 knit around 4 row row 35-38 1x1 ribbing starting with a knit stitch 4 row row 39-42 knit around 4 row row 43-46 1x1 ribbing starting with a purl stitch 4 row decrease for crown switch to double pointed needles when knitting circular becomes too tight row 1 k7 k2tog repeat to end of row 64 st row 2 knit row 3 k6 k2tog repeat to end of row 56st row 4 knit row 5 k5 k2tog repeat to end of row 48st row 6 knit row 7 k4 k2tog repeat to end of row 40st row 8 k3 k2tog repeat to end of row 32st row 9 k2 k2tog repeat to end of row 24st row 10 k1 k2tog repeat to end of row 16st row 11 k2tog around 8st cut yarn leaving a tail of about 6 weave through remaining 8 stitches and pull tight weave in ends remember that the inside of the bottom of the hat is visible when you turn the brim up
